roleset.name: fasten, bind
roleset.note: STRAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'strap' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from strap.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: strap-v: all arguments
example.text: British customs officers said [0] they 'd arrested eight men sneaking 111 rare snakes into Britain -- including one man who [*T*-1]strapped a pair of boa constrictors under his armpits .

roleset.name: be in need of
roleset.note: STRAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'strap' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from strap.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: strap-v: pseudo passive
example.text: But not even Goldman would make a market in the securities of Southland , the owner of the nationwide chain of 7-11 convenience stores that [*T*-13]-12 is strapped [*-12]for cash .
example.arg: that -> the nationwide chain of 7-11 convenience stores

example.name: strapped-j with cause of need
example.text: FEMA, which coordinates federal disaster relief, is already strapped by the costs of cleaning up after Hurricane Hugo, which hit the Carolinas last month.
example.arg: FEMA, which coordinates federal disaster relief,
by the costs of cleaning up after Hurricane Hugo, which hit the Carolinas last month

roleset.name: to beat with a strap
roleset.note: STRAP-V NOTES: No examples in the corpus (from strap.03-v)

example.name: strap-v
example.text: King backdropped a charging Kage over the top and strapped him with a belt - solid licks that produced some nice welts.
